description:
Easy canyon with easy access. There is one decent slide and jump inside. The nice thing about this canyon is that you're allowed in (whilst access to the superior canyons in Mureung Valley [same mountain] is prohibited)

There is one road into this valley. Park at the large recreational area and walk the last 5 minutes of road. When the road makes its last fork, head right, past the private property. Trail into the canyon is gained by going through the gate.

Canyon is unbolted.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background
name: Samcheok Guryong Falls (Dutasan)
